PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-00882012-02-27IC,  ,  ,  , 
ActDepartment of Industry Act
PrecisApproval of the establishment by the Minister of Industry of an advisory council, to be known as the Review of Aersospace and Space Programs and Policies; and approval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of the HONOURABLE DAVID L. EMERSON, P.C., of Vancouver, British Columbia, as the head of the Review of Aerospace and Space Programs and Policies, to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis for a term of one year.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the establishment by the Minister of Industry of an advisory council, to be known as the Review of Aersospace and Space Programs and Policies; and approval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of the HONOURABLE DAVID L. EMERSON, P.C., of Vancouver, British Columbia, as the head of the Review of Aerospace and Space Programs and Policies, to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis for a term of one year.
